section.title: Description
section.p: Contains information describing any medical devices (whether suspect or concommittant) used by the subject near the time of the adverse event occurred.

stentry.p: The date the patient stopped using the product. Medwatch 3500 form question E.7; Medwatch 3500A form question D.7; Medwatch 3500B form question C.7.
The date the patient began to use the product. Medwatch 3500 form question E.6; Medwatch 3500A form question D.6; Medwatch 3500B form question C.6.
Is this product meant to be used only one time (i.e., single-use), but was reprocessed and/or reused? Medwatch 3500 form question E.8; Medwatch 3500A form question D.8.

Was the operator or user of the device neither the patient nor a healthcare professional? If yes, the other user text should be valued. Medwatch 3500 form question E.5; Medwatch 3500A form question D.5; Medwatch 3500B form question C.5.
Is this product meant to be used only one time (i.e., single-use), but was reprocessed and/or reused?
(note that the MedWatch 3500B and the VAERS-1 forms do not have this element).
Pointer to the Device Instance (and therefore more generic information about the device product) that is suspected to have caused the adverse event, product problem, or product use error.
Medwatch 3500A form question D.1 (brand name), D.2 (commond device name), D.2.b (Procom), 5, box 2.
